page.title: 04FRUIT FARMING
page.content: Much of the land to the south of the area is given over to {FRUIT FARMING} and the main grower is JUSTIN BROOKES LTD. This firm was started by Mr Justin Brooke who was a member of the Brooke Bond family. Justin Brooke was a great benefactor of the area not only providing work but giving to the poor and encouraging social activity. The firm is still the largest employer in the area. Large quantities of apples are grown and the firm has a packing station and cold store at STRADISHALL. Pears,plums and soft fruit, especially strawberries, are grown and the firm bottles apple juice.
